nodes.text:
Churba was the cosmopolitan sector capital of the Churba sector, known for its cutting-edge technology. It was headquarters of Sencil Corporation. The Rebel Alliance stole the museum dreadnaught New Hope from the planet's orbit. The Imperial Intelligence agent Kirtan Loor and Rogue Squadron pilot Dar Keyis were from the planet.
Tetengo Noor, a Human male in the New Republic military, was also from Churba.
